author: Maggie Maloney
title: Best Celebrity Tweets of Super Bowl 2017 - Celebs Live Tweet from Super Bowl 51
text:
The 14 Best Celebrity Tweets About Super Bowl 51 
Let's talk ~sports~. And also Lady Gaga. Most Popular By Maggie Maloney and Kayleigh Roberts Feb 5, 2017 Super Bowl LI has been full of jaw-dropping moments and we're not just talking about the actual football game that took place. From Lady Gaga's halftime performance to that insane overtime win, there has been no shortage of OMGs. Since the internet is *literally* the best, our favorite celebrities have shared their reactions on Twitter. Here are just a few of those tweets: We are ready! Let's go tombrady !! Let's go Pats!!! ✨✨ https://t.co/DkZdVzH7a0 
— Gisele Bündchen (@giseleofficial) February 5, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 
— Mark Wahlberg (@mark_wahlberg) February 5, 2017 Most Popular 
— Chris Evans (@ChrisEvans) February 5, 2017 I think Lady Gaga just dropped the mic and then black swanned herself?! #Superbowl 
— Rachel Bloom (@Racheldoesstuff) February 6, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 
— christine teigen (@chrissyteigen) February 6, 2017 Things, they are a happening pic.twitter.com/JqDrnf70KL 
— christine teigen (@chrissyteigen) February 6, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 
— Katie Couric (@katiecouric) February 5, 2017 Most Popular 
— Snoop Dogg (@SnoopDogg) February 5, 2017 Just an FYI: A 250 lb football player, running 15 mph, has more kinetic energy than a bullet fired from an AK-47 rifle.
